title: Super Bowl Sunday.  Let's make a trade before the game starts!
author: BBT206

posts.post_title: Super Bowl Sunday.  Let's make a trade before the game starts!
posts.post_content: Would anyone like to make a trade for T206's before the game starts.  If so, email me at [url]b.brownbaseball@verizon.net[/url].   Have a lot of SGC graded T206's available to trade.  Thanks, Bill
Let's knock Killian off your list. I need a decent SC 150 fact #30.
